# Packages

```{r}
library(dplyr)
library(tidyr)
library(ggplot2)
```

# Data preparation
## Load data

```{r}
data("diamonds")
summary(diamonds)
```
## Filtering Rows
```{r}
diamonds[8, ] # 8th row
diamonds[c(2, 12), ] # 2nd and 12th rows
diamonds[c(4, 9), 'clarity'] # 4th and 9th rows, column 'clarity'
```
